signature_dish.name: London broil
signature_dish.description: Made by broiling or grilling marinated flank steak, then cutting it across the grain into thin strips.

signature_dish.name: Chateaubriand
signature_dish.description: Consists of a large center cut fillet of tenderloin grilled between two lesser pieces of meat that are discarded after cooking.

signature_dish.name: Steak au poivre
signature_dish.description: Consists of a steak, traditionally a filet mignon, coated with coarsely cracked peppercorns and then cooked.

signature_dish.name: Beef Wellington
signature_dish.description: Fillet steak coated with pâté (often pâté de foie gras) and duxelles, which is then wrapped in parma ham and puff pastry, then baked.

signature_dish.name: pork tenderloin sandwich
signature_dish.description: Contains a breaded and fried cutlet similar to the Wiener Schnitzel and is popular in the Midwest region of the United Statesething.

signature_dish.name: Salisbury steak
signature_dish.description: made from a blend of ground beef and other ingredients and usually served with gravy or brown sauce.
